TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Teng_Li_jiun, title = Teng_Li_jiun, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Teng_Li_jiun} }

S.FORM: == Teng Li Jiun 鄧麗君 == u siwkay niza Teng Li Jiun (1953.129-1995.5.8), tatayna, nu Taywan a mudadiway atu mupalaway. 1967 a mihca, patahkal tu ku sakacacay a dadiw-cuanci. 1970-1980 a mihca, takalaw ku kawaw niza , singangan i kitakit. sisa singangan tu ku "Yaco Dadiw a tatayna". 1995 a mihca, zayhan adada' ciniza , caay kakapah ku hanhan niza, u uzip niza 42 mihca. a'su ku dadiw niza, sangulan ku bihid niza. aluman ku manamuh cinizaan. mapatay ciniza sa, katuud ku malalumay i kiatakit. u sapuyaay a kakuniza u kawaw niza u sulit nu Hulam Teresa Teng (29 January 1953 – 8 May 1995) was a Taiwanese singer. She was known for her folk songs and romantic ballads, such as "When Will You Return?" and "The Moon Represents My Heart". She recorded songs not only in her native Mandarin but also in Taiwanese Hokkien, Cantonese, Japanese,Indonesian and English. Teng, a longtime sufferer of asthma, died from a severe respiratory attack while on vacation in Thailand in 1995, at the age of 42. u sulit nu Lipun . u kawlah niza Taywan a kawlah (amicunus henay tu sulit.待補充) u uzip niza (amicunus henay tu sulit.待補充)

== Teng Li Jion 鄧麗君 == o siwkay niza Teng Li Jion (1953.129-1995.5.8), tatayna, no Taywan a modadiway ato mopalaway. 1967 a mihca, patahkal to ko sakacacay a dadiw-coanci. 1970-1980 a mihca, takalaw ko kawaw niza , singangan i kitakit. sisa singangan to ko "Yaco Dadiw a tatayna". 1995 a mihca, zayhan adada' ciniza , caay kakapah ko hanhan niza, o ozip niza 42 mihca. a'so ko dadiw niza, sangolan ko bihid niza. aloman ko manamoh cinizaan. mapatay ciniza sa, katood ko malalomay i kiatakit. o sapoyaay a kakoniza o kawaw niza o solit no Holam Teresa Teng (29 Janoary 1953 – 8 May 1995) was a Taiwanese singer. She was known for her folk songs and romantic ballads, soch as "When Will Yoo Retorn?" and "The Moon Represents My Heart". She recorded songs not only in her native Mandarin bot also in Taiwanese Hokkien, Cantonese, Japanese,Indonesian and English. Teng, a longtime sofferer of asthma, died from a severe respiratory attack while on vacation in Thailand in 1995, at the age of 42. o solit no Lipon . o kawlah niza Taywan a kawlah (amiconos henay to solit.待補充) o ozip niza (amiconos henay to solit.待補充)
